abstract: The investors behind the Kraft-Heinz merger may be looking for more deals, with Mondelez International and other companies potentially up for grabs.
snippet: The investors behind the Kraft-Heinz merger may be looking for more deals, with Mondelez International and other companies potentially up for grabs.
lead_paragraph: The Brazilian billionaires at 3G Capital that turned Kraft Heinz and Anheuser-Busch InBev into mega-acquisition machines will dive back into the buying business in the coming year. Their next target should be Mondelez International, the $66 billion food conglomerate that failed to coax the chocolate maker Hershey into a sale in 2016. A deal will require some unusual ingredients.

headline.main: 3G Capital Is Expected to Be in a Buying Mood in 2017
